title: not able to get in game
body:
client started..aram was chosen but when we all select the champs and we re ready to go in i got just black screen.
i closed the client and it say"we removed new client version(back to older one) we try to upgrade it now.
i think it's this bloody client again.
tried a lot of time to reconnect but i m stuck until game is not finished.
i want back the old client this one is bugged as hell.

replies.body: It sounds like you might have some bad game files that didn't install properly during your update.  My suggestion here would be to download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a clean reinstall to fix that up.  Test it in a custom, and let me know if you run into any trouble.
Have you tried initiating a full repair or uninstalling and reinstalling the game?
